original_title: The Return of Ulysses to his Homeland - Champs-Elysée
overview: In the new production of the Return of Ulysses at the Théâtre des Champs-Elysées all the ingredients were gathered for a successful show: the music of Monteverdi, a mythological story, a wonderful orchestra on period instruments, baroque specialists like Magdalena Kožená, Isabelle Druet and Katherine Watson, and finally the exuberant Rolando Villazón.
title: The Return of Ulysses to his Homeland - Champs-Elysée
